title: Jon Luke Kirby
summary:
Jon Luke Kirby (born 23 September 1998) is a professional rugby league footballer who plays as a prop or second-row forward for the York Knights in the RFL Championship. He had previously played for the Huddersfield Giants.
He has spent time on loan from Huddersfield Giants at Hunslet in Betfred League 1, Halifax and Dewsbury Rams in the Betfred Championship.
In 2019 he made his Super League début for the Giants against Hull F.C.On 11 November 2022 it was announced that Kirby had joined the York Knights.
